content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_sign

thought: To craft a crimson sign, I need to place 9 crimson planks in the crafting grid. Since I have 6 crimson planks in my inventory, I will start by moving one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
